error.checkNetwork: Check your internet connection and try again.

notFound.title: Not found
notFound.description: Perhaps you are not logged in or missing some permissions.

noAccess.mustBeLoggedIn: You need to be logged in to watch this content
noAccess.otherContent: Don't worry, there's still plenty of other content to enjoy!

calendar.timeTableIsLocalTime: Timetable is in your local time.

competition.title: Double your chances
competition.description: Get a higher chance to win the exclusive Disse mine ord prize by answering correctly.
competition.onlyOnce: You can only take the quiz once.
competition.watchNextBroadcast: Watch the next live studio broadcast to see the right answers.
competition.terms: By participating you agree that your name can be shown in the broadcast when announcing the winner.
competition.alreadySent: You have already submitted, but you can still see what you answered.
competition.lookThouroughly: Review your answers carefully. Once submitted, you will not be able to change your answer.
competition.dontMiss: Don't miss the next studio broadcast, where the correct answer will be announced.

watchAgain.title: Watch again
watchAgain.description: For a deeper understanding, we recommend watching the video more than once.

cookies.title: This website uses cookies
cookies.description: We use cookies to improve the user experience on this website. If you continue to use this website, you consent to our cookies.

footer.information:
BCC Media is a media foundation in the [BCC federation](https://bcc.no) that produces and distributes content with positive and Christian values.

BCC Media is a registered broadcaster and adheres to the regulations laid down in the Norwegian Broadcasting Act. The supervisory body for this Act is [the Norwegian Media Authority](https://medietilsynet.no/).

share.title: Share
share.membersOnly: This video is only accessible to users that are logged in.

feedback.comment: Add a comment to your experience
feedback.episodeTitle: How would you rate this episode?
feedback.howEasyToUnderstand: How easy was it to understand the video?
feedback.anonymousInfo: Your rating will be submitted anonymously
feedback.placeholder: Please be as detailed as possible to help us understand.

contactLocalBukIfWrong: Contact the person responsible in your local BUK association if you think this is wrong.
